website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-assemble, practical style with built-in storage.
pros: Decorative, sturdy design and clear, straightforward directions  make assembly of this bench hassle-free
Under-seat storage makes this a practical purchase
The resin material can be easily sprayed down with a garden hose for cleaning
cons: This bench may crack under enough weight and can warp in rain

customer_reviews.title: Cat Poop Outhouse 👍
customer_reviews.text: Improvised cat litter box with a cheap battery powered motion light inside that stays on for 3 minutes. Swinging door to keep the poop smell out of the house. It fits a large litter box inside 17" wide and a door mat for litter control. Used my dremel tool, razor knife, marker, screwdriver and a cheap cat door. The bench took me maybe 5 minutes to put together. Perfect for my needs. My cat poops in style!
customer_reviews.author: JEFF L MCGEE

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed, I called the customer service number
customer_reviews.text: When this arrived it was missing a piece. Annoyed, I called the customer service number. I was pleasantly surprised by a friendly professional employee who got the missing piece to me the next day. Impressive. It wasn't fun to put together but I was able to do it myself in about 30 minutes with minimal profanity. It is sturdy and so far no water has leaked into it. My son keeps his sports equipment in it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but be aware
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench, good storage, but if there is water on the bench and you open the top, the water will go inside the storage area. Rain does not go inside when lid is closed, I don't think, but standing water does when you open the top. Learned the hard way. Also, bench is... comfortable, for what it is. Overall, I'd buy it again; it was what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bench, good customer service
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive plastic bench - nothing fancy, but quite nice. In no known universe can it be "assembled in five minutes" as the package says, but it actually was quite easy to snap together following the very clear instructions. One small part was missing, so I called the customer service number provided. They were quite courteous and helpful, and they sent the replacement part right away. I would definitely recommend this bench for simple outdoor seating and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Dislike
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these thinking they would be great on my covered front porch. It was pretty simple to put together but the parts don't really fit in place as they should so the seat part of the bench won't stay in place. Its not very sturdy for seating because of that. Im returning the 2nd one i ordered since its still in the box. Im really unhappy with the one i have but honestly don't want disassemble and revising to return it because ita so bulky. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Arandas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: Received and pieces have apparently sitting around in the heat and are warped. I have contacted the seller "Suncast" sent them pics and have not received any replies from them. I have previously purchased a utility shed from them with no problems. But this bench is JUNK!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Beaird

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsier than I'd like for the price. When you sit on it (195 lbs), you kind of wonder if it's okay to sit on. We put it under 2 levels of deck, against the house and towels we hoped to keep by an outside shower became damp after a rain. Perhaps we were expecting too much of this. It might be fine for keeping pool toys or other things that you were okay with getting wet, but if you want to keep something dry, this isn't the product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Terrible & cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in this bench. The bench was cracked in 4 different places, which could have been through the delivery process, I am unsure. The quality is thin and cheap and assembly was bothersome when trying to snap everything into place - other areas would unsnap and flip up, it was a fight and wrestle match between us and the bench. The storage is ample but when I sit on it (I am 115 pounds) I hear loud snaps as if I am going to fall through to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jilly

customer_reviews.title: The later pieces went on fairly easily. After we got it all assembled on our ...
customer_reviews.text: Putting together the first three pieces was difficult. The later pieces went on fairly easily. After we got it all assembled on our porch, I noticed a flaw on the left edge of the seat - not a damage flaw, instead a flaw in the way it was molded in the factory. If that doesn't lead to a problem with the bench being water resistent, I guess it is OK, even though it is visible.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon

customer_reviews.title: Stands up to Michigan Snow...
customer_reviews.text: Bought our bench summer of 2016..it has been amazing..at that time we also bought the large storage unit for our lounge chair cushions..during our Michigan winter we wrapped our cushions in huge trash bags and stored them in the storage unit..put, some Lavender in with them..come spring they were fresh and ready to go on our lounge chairs..bench is great outside for our pool area stores things you don't want laying around...today I received the chair and two storage/tables/seats..can't wait to get them all together..Love these and so easy to take care of..love the storage and nothing laying around...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Important, simple fix to know about
customer_reviews.text: The bench went together OK. I watched a YouTube video first. But when I sat down, it made loud pops and sounded like it was breaking. I looked at the bottom of the seat. The last line of the honeycomb had small waves--a quarter of an inch. I taped all those forward. That solved the problem. Now, I sit on it, and there is no noise at all. It feels nice and solid. I am only writing this review because I wish I had known this solution. It would have saved me a lot of distress. Now it is a fine bench. Solid. Quiet. I knocked a star down because I had to come up with the solution.
customer_reviews.author: June Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and fits well in space
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for outdoor storage for hoses, sprinklers, and other yard items that I use frequently in the summer--items that I need quick and easy access to. This bench fits everything I wanted inside, and I still have more space, and it keeps everything dry and clean. It looks nice on my front porch and, while fairly lightweight, it seems sturdy enough. I can sit on it, anyway, and, though I haven't yet, I'm sure I'll stand on the seat at some point to clean the top of the window it sits under. It took me only a few minutes to put together (by myself).
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Dillahunt

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this to be purchased by anyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bench for extra storage and seating on my patio. I was seating on it while having a small get together and fell through it. The lid gave way and down I went. This is very flimsy and cheaply made. I would not recommend this to be purchased by anyone. I buy multiple items per week from amazon and this has been the biggest disappointment by far. SAVE your money this is not worth unboxing and putting together and might even result in injury.
customer_reviews.author: ellen smith

customer_reviews.title: My porch is tidy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My porch has so much "stuff" on it. It was a dumping ground for books and the wicker furniture was awful. I bought thjs bench and then I made cushions, from foam I bought in a long roll. I put all the "stuff" inside, added the cushions and another smaller rubbermaid-like storage bench. Added some fairy lights and my porch is not the favorite room in the house, because of these excellent storage benches. It was put together fairly quickly by my son and husband, Very satisfied with this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine

customer_reviews.title: Don't  bother
customer_reviews.text: What the hell is this piece of crap, with the instructions and u tube it says 30mins If the pieces fitted properly it would work, but they don't every time you try to click into place if pops back out, so now 3 hours later still on part two and three, when the box came it seemed as it was a return from somebody else.can see why. save your money on this cheap bench.. and Amazon it's time for me to go back to the stores.. As imported cheap shoddy items by skeptical retailers can't do it anymore wasting my money.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent product
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived with a lot of damage to the box. Some pieces of the bench were bent and made the 5 minute assembly turn into about 10-15 minutes. No instructions included but I’m not sure they’re needed. As for weatherproof, we had a massive downpour last night and when I checked the inside of the bench this morning, no leaks were apparent. Sturdiness? Maybe one moderately overweight person or two lean adults, but I’d question anything more than that. I don’t plan on sitting on it much, so not too concerned. Overall, a decent product but I wasn’t happy about the state it was in when delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel Golonka

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews and was kind of scared to see what I had purchased. I put it together in less than 20 minutes with only the instructions that came with it. I did take a hammer and lightly tap a pieces in place. Again, I read reviews and kind of knew what to expect. Once put together, I sat on it and it felt sturdier than the other tubular metal ones I've sat on. Over all I feel like it was a good purchase and I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA COLLINS

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bench
customer_reviews.text: Bench is really nice for storage and it keeps everything dry. I can comfortably sit on it but I am small, I just hope someone heavier does not dismantle it. The assembly I feel was hard. The pieces would not snap in place on one side and I actually had to cut off a little of the plastic for the piece to fit in correctly. Its attractive and functional but I just hope it stays together over time. I am overall happy with the purchase but wish it was a little more sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: clgitsme

customer_reviews.title: It'll work.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to assemble, but some of the pieces were slightly warped. I used butter knife to pry open pieces so they could be fitted and snapped together. Unfortunately, the warps are visible after assembly. They're on the front of the bench. The bench seems sturdy enough for two people, but the flat/hard surface would not make it the seating option of choice. Although it has yet to be out in the rain, I doubt it will prove to be waterproof. I bought it to store pool chemicals and supplies. I think it will work nicely that purpose and at a reasonable price point I can live with a few minor blemishes.
customer_reviews.author: David L. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: This is nice, was not too hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is nice, was not too hard to put together, some peices were hard to snap but I got it together in 30 minutes or so. It is longer than I had imagined and not quite at sturdy, not heavy at all, will have to put something heavy in it when it gets windy. It sits Very straight up, not something you would want to "nap" on.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy to put together as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Directions were fairly explicit, however, I had difficulty getting the first two pieces to lock in place. Two calls to the company helped somewhat but I did not want the hassle of uploading a picture so the staff could provide more detailed assistance thus I elected to get a rubber hammer and force/lock the first two pieces together. Once those two pieces went together the remainder was far easier but it took 2 1/2 hours to complete. Water that lays on the seat will drip down into the storage area. This unit serves the purpose for which I purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized storage bench.
customer_reviews.text: A nice, easy to assemble, bench with storage. We put it on our deck and stored bird seed for our feeders in it. The squirrels, however had another idea. They were able to easily chew holes in the seat 'lid' and gain entry into the interior. It's probably better suited to store 'stuff' rather than anything that wildlife wants to get at.
customer_reviews.author: drallim

customer_reviews.title: Do not get this if you suck at puzzles
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. It didn’t come with instructions, I’m pretty good at putting things together so I wasn’t too worried. Except it needs to be put together in a very specific order or it won’t work. The parts aren’t easy to take apart which would be a good thing if I didn’t have to take pieces off. If you’re not good at puzzles DO NOT get this
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Decent bench storage
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench with storage- pretty sturdy but it’s definitely not waterproof. We got it for our pool things- towels, toys, life jackets and now have to by totes to keep things in so they don’t get wet. Very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: S.Decker

customer_reviews.title: Terrific bench. This is my second Suncast product
customer_reviews.text: Terrific bench. This is my second Suncast product, also have the deck box. They are sturdy, easy to assemble. I'm using the bench on my front walkway for UPS, USPS & Fedex deliveries to be stored if I'm not home. I put up a sign on the gate asking delivery people to put boxes inside the bench so they re protected from the elements as well as curious people. I discovered the bench is water proof after a rainy weekend. It will be great to sit on and enjoy the morning sun with a cup of coffee too.
customer_reviews.author: RogueValGal

customer_reviews.title: not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I had to lay 2 teak shower platforms in the bottom of storage box to keep items off the floor. When in rains about an inch of water sits in the base. Customer service was weak. Buyer Beware.
customer_reviews.author: shoegirl22

customer_reviews.title: It's good but...
customer_reviews.text: It looks great, wasn't too hard to assemble, keeps the pool towels dry but does not hold an average size person. It seems cheap in the sturdy department. I'm about a buck and a half and my husband might be close to 2 bucks and it starts to collapse when I sit on it...so he won't try it. A little disappointing but we didn't buy it for the seating more for the storage.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi_Jo

customer_reviews.title: Simple to put together, no tools needed
customer_reviews.text: In these cold months I suggest waiting until the parts reach room temperature before attempting assembly. Cold plastic is brittle and these parts can break. Follow the directions for the assembly and you'll have no problem. Very pleased with the results! Happy with my purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, and large enough to hold most of what ...
customer_reviews.text: I live on a main street and needed a place to hide my packages and this fit the bill perfectly. It's decorative, sturdy, and large enough to hold most of what I order online!! It was fairly easy to put together--it was helpful to have another person hold the sides and so forth but no tools were needed at all. The first one I ordered had a defect and it was returned with no questions at all. This one arrived in perfect condition and I coulnd't be happier. Oh and by the way, it's for people watching too.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Great bench though an obvious return from Amazon.instead of a new one.
customer_reviews.text: The bench itself is great. Clearly this one (sold by Amazon) had been opened before and was thrown together with parts tied together with packing tape. There were no directions or any info in the box.. This was obviously a return. It took a few minutes to figure out assembly without directions but all went together well and the bench was exactly as ordered. The repacking, beat up box and lack of instructions was a little tacky though.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Damaged pieces but box perfectly fine!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about storage bench. It would provide a place for pool and yard supplies and at a decent price. Unfortunately, when we took it out of the box (which was not damamged at all) plastic pieces were bent, the back rest was missing pieces, so now it looks like it has holes. It took 3 people to bend plastic pieces back in order to get the other prieces to fit correctly. Looking for som what of a refund! Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Ang K.

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! This was not easy to put together. The pieces did not fit together properly. 5 minutes? No. Sturdy? Doubtful. Buy something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: nice storage space for kids' toys
customer_reviews.text: I would never pay full price for this...but, it is working well for what we needed it for. Thick plastic, nice storage space for kids' toys, seating. I don't think it would hold up with lots of weight repeatedly on the top bench part. One side of the bench didn't fit perfectly in place, so there is a small space where there should not be. Not a big deal though, it is still fully functional. Overall, a nice, useful piece for the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Blake L.

customer_reviews.title: Its like a puzzle to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Althoug it doesn't need any tools to asemble it didn't came with any instructions.And when we were almost finish mounting it ,we had to take some parts out again because the last pieces wouldn't fit.Whicj gave of a real hard time because once you put the pieves together they are very difficult to take themnout again. It also says is for outwear use.But if it rains it will be all wet on the inside ot the box.Because it has spaces between the parts that will allow the rain inside.
customer_reviews.author: lilly

customer_reviews.title: Best Patio Bench Ever
customer_reviews.text: Love this bench. We purchased this bench after we put in a hot tub. I wanted something that we could sit on and store spa supplies in and it certainly does both well. I has made it through the winter in the north with snow and now the spring and summer with lots of rain and never leaked inside once!! I store my cushions in there when not using them and they stay nice and dry. Great buy...
customer_reviews.author: ceecee8609

customer_reviews.title: Good porch bench
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my front porch in 2017. It's on the porch of my new house now. The bench was a bit tricky to put together, but eventually I figured it out. I made it by myself. It's very sturdy. On a nice day, my boyfriend and I both sit on it outside. It's also great for delivery people to hide packages and seems mostly waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: april

customer_reviews.title: Like it, buuuut...
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy the heck out of this bad boy, buuuut... two of our larger friends sat on it six months ago and it's never been the same. Seat hinge doesn't lock into place. Also it came missing a part (the cover over the top of the seat), but it wasn't essential so we didn't bother fussing about it.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE IT FILLS UP WITH WATER EVERYTIME IT RAINS
customer_reviews.text: I like the Bench. It is attractive and provides nice seating, but due to water collecting inside it is not practical for storage.
customer_reviews.author: JOLYEENE

customer_reviews.title: No instructions made it confusing to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: There were no instructions included, not even a single sheet with pictures showing what to do 1st, 2nd, etc. The description says no tools needed, 5 minute assembly! It took over 45 minutes because I had to keep trying to figure out what had to be "snapped" in first, etc. It was maddening. I'll probably not buy any more Suncast products!
customer_reviews.author: W. P. Emil

customer_reviews.title: snaps together
customer_reviews.text: It snaps together but with no directions in the box. I had never done one on my own before. I did it but had someone look at it later and i put a piece on backwards. Becareful, once you snap it together , its very hard to get apart. My grandkids love it on the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Fish

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn’t get this because of some negative reviews. I am so glad I did. It wasn’t that difficult to put together. I did put some screws in it to make it more stable since I like to move stuff around...a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Caudill

customer_reviews.title: Strong durable functional
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with looks of finished product, just received it. However, my order DID NOT come with set of paper instructions. Pieces are labeled with letters , except for the top back piece is not labeled. Put together two back pieces first (one labeled one not!), which resulted in a long process to undo. Looking forward to having this for a long time. Functional & durable.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my bench
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble if you are not me. Got my husband to help and we had it together in about 15 minutes. Seems to be a sturdy bench. Very happy with the size and appearance of this bench and extremely happy with the price. I had some cushions that fit it perfectly. I keep it in my mud rum. Great place to sit and remove your shoes and the storage compartment is great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: These were EXTREMELY easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: These were EXTREMELY easy to put together. NO TOOLS REQUIRED!!!! I purchased 2 of these benches for my barn / horse trailer for traveling and sitting in the barn area. Easy to clean and light enough to just move out of the way when needed. The storage area is HUGE!!!! We can keep horse blankets, grooming boxes, horse treats :) in there...... no problem. And it keeps the aisle looking tidy! I will post pics soon and update after a few months in hard use :)
customer_reviews.author: Traci E. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great dual seating and storage
customer_reviews.text: Great little storage bin/seating area. I had no problems putting it together myself. I am using it on my back deck to store bird seed and gardening tools. The bird seed is in a metal container that fits neatly inside the lift up seat. Arrived in good order.
customer_reviews.author: Babs101

customer_reviews.title: It popps together and works.
customer_reviews.text: It's decent quality. A little pricey for what it is but it will do its job and it's pretty good looking. Plastic just snaps together and even though it's warped it straightens out once it's in place. I just reduced it one star because I felt the price was a little more than what the expectation of product is.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my deck cushions
customer_reviews.text: This product cam in six sections and I was skeptical about putting it together by myself. It was somewhat of a challenge to get the front and back pieces to stay in place in order to continue to the next step of putting the side panels on. I perservered and applied duct tape during assembly to hold them in place. I am a determined person once I start a project! I suggest two people assemble this bench. Once together, it fits my expectations in every way. Haven't had it rain since assembling it and I do hope it is truly is keeps cushions dry.
customer_reviews.author: GrannyJanny

customer_reviews.title: 2 Man Job
customer_reviews.text: This came with no instructions and is very light weight. Each piece was stamped as to where it was supposed to go but you pretty much have to align everything up as to where it goes and snap it together at the same time or it won't fit properly. It's more a 2 or 3 person job then a 1 person but once I got it figured out it wasn't too bad. Not meant for storing any heavy items but seems sturdy enough for sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Rusti B.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful in step 1.
customer_reviews.text: As always, Suncast engineering results in sturdy, stable product well fitted together. The instructions for this product need improving: In step one make clear that the snaps must match the correct holes - there are snaps and holes on both sides, different number and different spacing. Beyond that, an easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Retired in Atlanta

customer_reviews.title: It is a good buy for sitting on and storage
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints. It is a good buy for sitting on and storage. It took us about 45 minutes to an hour to put it together. I still need to make a cushion for it. Storage space is bigger than I thought it would be and that is a good thing. It was easy to pop together and looks nice on the front porch. Sturdy enough to hold Amazon packages! Very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MaryH

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bench, as much as the mini bench we have. We put this right by the pool for the pool toys, and it holds so much more than I planned, or expected. In addition, it's super durable and sturdy, and fits three kids or 2 bigger adults very comfortably. In addition, it's been raining just about every day for the last three weeks, and everything inside stayed completely dry. Don't open the cover if it's wet, then the water will run inside, but that should be a no-brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great bench for storage and sitting.
customer_reviews.text: This item provides extra seating in our outdoor area and also gives me a place to store outdoor sports equipment for our visiting grandchildren. They know the badminton set, jump ropes, ring toss, etc. are inside this bench. Some moisture does get into the storage area, so I store their items inside large garbage bags to be sure everything stays dry and that works fine. After all we live in south Louisiana and it rains HARD & frequently down here. It was pretty easy to assemble but does require two people.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra C. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to be worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Decided to go with this bench based on the reviews. They weren't perfect but seemed better than all the other ones. The bench feels very cheap and flimsy. The strip on top of the backrest wont stay down and keeps popping up. Looks like there is a tab inside that's cracked. This was one of the pieces that came pre-assembled, so it's not something that I damaged during assembly. Overall, I feel like $80 is too much money to spend on something of this quality. We will see how it holds up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: There’s no way this bench could be waterproof. The seams are not tight and I had to cover It with a tarp for the winter. Plus it came with no instructions. It was obvious that someone had returned it because of how the box was taped back together. I couldn’t return it because my husband destroyed the box. Very disappointed in this bench
customer_reviews.author: Kay A Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor storage solution. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this storage bench in 2011, now in October 2015 it is still holding up beautifully....and can you believe...wait for it...wait for it....IT IS STILL WATERPROOF. I love this bench. We were using it for outdoor supplies (garden tools, tiki torch fuel, outdoor pillows etc) but recently we went camping and this was a great addition to our campsite. I love when things pull double duty.
customer_reviews.author: Whoa Babe

customer_reviews.title: HOW SMART I FEEL AFTER ASSEMBLY WAS DONE!!
customer_reviews.text: This is soooooo great! It looks clean and neat and sits on my patio and hides all my bits and pieces of outdoor stuff I need there. I actually have a patio that does not look like it should be in the movie "Deliverance"! I am VERY pleased. I also have to say that it was next to easy to put together myself. I will not say easy because that would indicate I have more intelligence than I do. Once I got the hang of it, it was well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: junebug

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench.
customer_reviews.text: Nice bench... My 18 yr old put it together so I don't think it's too complicated. Not as solid as I'd hoped, but a good bench. I use it to sit and wait for the school bus everyday so it's not getting really heavy use, but it hasn't fallen apart. My kids also use it to store their basketballs, etc. It's a good product and I'm happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: There were duplicate pieces of a rain gutter so allows ...
customer_reviews.text: There were duplicate pieces of a rain gutter so allows water collection in the base. Amazon doesn't provide missing parts and recommends going straight to the manufacturer which for this, it isn't made any more. I would return but the box was not useable after opening. Also, I didn't realize the part was missing until full assembly so hard to return to Amazon for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew N.

customer_reviews.title: Suncast Deck Furniture Products
customer_reviews.text: Loved this one! Only a tiny bit of water got in it in one indentation on the floor of the unit. The furniture - while snap together - is really sturdy. I am impressed with it! I plan on buying one to 2 more sets in the near future. Do wish they came in white and chocolate. But the beige is really a nice color. They are also VERY easy to wipe water off of and keep clean. I would absolutely buy these again, and plan to. Soon!
customer_reviews.author: CarolO

customer_reviews.title: Keeping everything dry!
customer_reviews.text: Very please with this purchase. While it does not hold the weight of 2 full sized adults, it is great for while I am out grilling and for storage. I waited to write to review to see how it would hold up in some storms and during the winter. So far it is staying water tight and keeping everything in good condition. It is a perfect fit for our patio.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Ptak

customer_reviews.title: Easy install! DIY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for indoors for folks sitting down putting on their boots or shoes. Great storage capacity! Well worth the $89. This was out together in 5 minutes. She rey I paid $128 to have it out together.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pettway

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bench !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bench.Very easy to snap together.I bought it to store my husband's grilling supplies.It holds a lot.A big bag of charcoal and several smaller bags of hickory,cherry and mesquite chunks.It also serves as a nice place to sit .We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Firefly

customer_reviews.title: These are junk.  No exaggeration.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before purchase but I decided to give them a chance. Upon arrival assembly was nothing but trouble. The parts are flimsy and after several attempts to assemble I realized there was a defect in manufacturing. Stay far away from these. My hope is that another similar product will meet my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Harney

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied  customer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to sit on my deck. This is a great product. While putting it together it appeared to be too flimsy, but once it was put together it sits comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: G. B.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Bench With Built In Storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife after purchasing an outstanding trash container for the house made from the same resin material. It is a pretty neat little bench which has under the seat storage. It assembled very easily in about 5 minutes, and will never rust. It handles the weight of two adults very easily. I am almost 300lbs and there is no problem. This company has many nice resin products. Just check them out. We found them by accident.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Pitts

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy, but I'm careful when I lean back because ...
customer_reviews.text: This bench is very attractive and holds my husband's grilling stuff. It's sturdy, but I'm careful when I lean back because the back moves back. Some of the pieces are already a bit warped, but I'm hoping it's done warping now. We've had it for about 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: KelTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. It's working but it keeps trying to pop back apart. We may end up putting some short screws in it to keep the seems tight. This thing just pops together, the only problem is it doesn't want to stay together and getting it to pop together isn't easy. We're keeping it but we need a second similar product and won't buy another another one.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: NOT weather proof. All of the kids toys are moldy from rainwater getting in. I have to dump rainwater out every time it rains. Useless for an outdoor storage bench
customer_reviews.author: Ladona

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed. Great price. Speedy shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the price! The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars: I feel like the product could be a little more stable. There's no screws involved in putting it together, it all just snaps together. It's perfect for my small porch and to keep unsightly items stored out of sight. The only ongoing annoyance is the popping sound when you first sit down (I'm just this is just the lid snapping back into place after being opened).
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Suncast
customer_reviews.text: Some of the panels were warped enough that sliding together was difficult. I used some soapy water to lubricate them and it helped. Not sure all the locking tabs took, It seems sturdy and should have been easier to assemble. Would have given four stars if I was sure it all latched as it should. I have a old Suncast deck box that has lasted many years.
customer_reviews.author: JDOLL

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this storage bench.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bench. The instructions left a bit to be desired, but I managed to get it put together. It is reasonably sturdy and looks nice on my porch. I doubt it will hold a huge amount of weight; probably best to seat my slimmer friends on it ;) The storage capacity is perfect for my gardening equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Smokee

customer_reviews.title: assembly
customer_reviews.text: they sent one wrong part and I have tried numerous times to contact the manufacturer to correct it and never once heard from anyone. Because of the wrong part, I cannot use it for its intended purpose...
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: Best storage for price
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to store my pool equipment in and be an extra seat. This jas worked out beautifully and was so easy to assemble the entire thing took minutes. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Cronkhite

customer_reviews.title: Hard to build
customer_reviews.text: It does it's job as storage, but it's really poor quality as a bench. It was also very challenging to put together. If you live in a windy area you'll need to put weight in the bottom. Occasionally I find the bench and contents all over the yard after a wind gust.
customer_reviews.author: lol

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench
customer_reviews.text: Replace almost the exact model that I have owned for at least 10 years. Followed directions and it went together without any problems. Looked at them at a local big box store where they were selling for $60.00 more. Checked my Amazon app and ordered it. Well made and a perfect fit for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: Alazzo

customer_reviews.title: Great storage bench
customer_reviews.text: Great storage bench. It has been able to withstand 2 Wisconsin winters on a covered porch. Great height for sitting on. I do wish it were a little more stable. I added 2 colorful outdoor pillows to dress it up a little.
customer_reviews.author: G. Roddick

customer_reviews.title: Great as a toy chest.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a toy chest for my great granddaughter for Christmas. I also bought spray paint so my grandson could spruce it up. This would need to be anchored to the wall so it wouldn't tip over when she starts climbing.
customer_reviews.author: Firstrategrandma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Sits about 2 inches higher than standard wood bench and the back comes up much higher = More comfortable seating. Best part is: No more leaves under the bench to sweep away!
customer_reviews.author: Plummy

customer_reviews.title: Good for storage and sitting.
customer_reviews.text: These patio benches were storage perfect for what we needed, however the construction material is not as thick as I expected. I have a Suncast 50 gallon deck box and it is alot sturdier in construction than these patio benches. So far they are holding up for storage and sitting.
customer_reviews.author: Alien

customer_reviews.title: This didn't snap together as easily as I thought it would but once we did ...
customer_reviews.text: This didn't snap together as easily as I thought it would but once we did get it all together it's exactly what I was looking for. We have it in our garage to store outdoor toys in, balls, bubbles, chalk etc. And it lets us have a place besides a low step to sit to quickly put on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richman

customer_reviews.title: Great Bench
customer_reviews.text: We have several pieces from this company and just like the others, this did not disappoint. Clicks together, Super sturdy and water tight. Don't hesitate.
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Look nice ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to keep hot tub supplies in and to accent in a flower bed. Looks nice while keeping things dry and clean. Not strong enough for every day use.
customer_reviews.author: I'm in the garden

customer_reviews.title: talk about cheap!
customer_reviews.text: Putting it together can be a chore, as the pieces need to be convinced to go together using a large rubber mallet. The seat is hinged on round protrusions which fit horribly in round holes in the sides. a lousy fit. If you could see and touch it before you ordered it.........you would not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: jim c

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Have had this product for several years. It's been outside in the California sun and is in perfect condition. Great storage for beach towels, etc.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Nice look with benefit of storage room.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bench. Was pretty easy to assemble. Would recommend two people just to have someone help you hold the pieces in place while you snap it together. A lot of storage room inside. I wouldn't stand on it, but more than sturdy enough to hold two adults sitting on it out on the deck. Clean, simple look that looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Did not have fun trying to put it togeather
customer_reviews.text: Did not have fun trying to put it togeather. Hard on an older person. Not as solid as I would have liked and not really sturdy enough to sit on unless you are 120 lbs. door s serve my storage purpose under a porch. Not waterproof though.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Dockery

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my cat's room. It's weatherproof so I figured it was perfect for them because they can scratch, poop or pee on it and nothing would happen to it. Plus it serves as storage for their food so it's perfect. They really like it and now I finally have somewhere to sit when I go and hang out with them in there.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Sturdy to sit on. No water or bugs can get in. Big enough to fill with outdoor toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I needed bench storage on my patio and this fits my needs but it is very difficult to assemble. The pieces are supposed to snap together, however the instructions are not clear. The pieces do not snap together easily and it took 2 people 1-1/2 hours, at times using a hammer to snap the pieces together. If you are looking for something easy to assemble this is not it !!
customer_reviews.author: Patty Coons

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: Was not very sturdy. Every time you sat on it you had to pop pieces back in. By the third time it totally collapsed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage and seating
customer_reviews.text: Just bought the third of these deck boxes.They are great to store toys and small garden stuff, and the seating is quite comfortable. It's best to assemble this one with two people; so much easier to press the sides into the bottom at both ends simultaneously; I got frustrated doing it by myself since one end of the upright front or back easily pops out when you try to push in the other end. First box took about 45 minutes to assemble. Of course, the second and third box only10 minutes each. Jury is still out on durability and/or any UV damage.
customer_reviews.author: Dita

customer_reviews.title: It's sturdy and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is on my front enclosed porch and it sits nice with a long cushion. Will be getting matching chairs in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Mom mom

customer_reviews.title: This is ok. It's definitely not Lifetime quality. ...
customer_reviews.text: This is ok. It's definitely not Lifetime quality. The bench traps debris in the back. The plastic is fairly flimsy. It bows if you weigh over 150 pounds. It's definitely not worth the sticker price of $140. Do yourself a favor and get a Lifetime product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large storage capacity.
customer_reviews.text: Great storage! We have a 7 foot Christmas Tree stored in it. Much better then those ugly Christmas Tree storage bags. It is not comfortable to sit on. The lid lifts very easily to access storage area. It is very easy for 2 people to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Part popped out in the back 🥺
customer_reviews.text: There was a piece popped out in the back. Water will surely seep in there, we are pretty disappointed. Time will tell how/if it will hold up. We put tape over it and are hoping for the best. I emailed the manufacturer, and have yet to hear back.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Good storage inside
customer_reviews.text: Directions were a little confusing but went together in no time. Not sure about sturdiness or how it will hold up this winter. Holds a lot inside and just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ccat

customer_reviews.title: Needs better instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday. The "5 minute assembly" is a crock. Wouldn't happen EVEN IF the instructions were decipherable. Called their customer service. On hold 14 minutes, hung up. Finally, without their help or help of instructions, I got together. Appears solid but don't get in a hurry. There has to be a better design.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy bench. Follow instructions to assemble each step or it won’t go together :-) has more storage than expect.
customer_reviews.author: Mel99

customer_reviews.title: Suncast did a wonderful job. Now I will have to purchase some ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I was a little apprehensive on putting together. Being mechanically inclined I found out it did take 5 minutes by following instructions carefully. A rubber mallet made lock in place pieces a little tighter and saved a bruised hand. Suncast did a wonderful job. Now I will have to purchase some side chairs from them.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Albro

customer_reviews.title: great seat, great storage.
customer_reviews.text: Love this box. I store my garden shoes and outside items in it. Now I can throw my clean shoes in and take my muddy boots out and sit while I am changing. Very sturdy, not too hard to put together, you might need a person to just help you hold sides while you snap them together, but I love this item. Waterproof, comfortable, and nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

product_meta.title: Suncast 50 Gallon Patio Bench with Storage - Decorative Resin Outdoor Patio Bench for Deck, Patio, Garden, Backyard - Ideal for Storing Toys, Cushions, Tools - Taupe ()
product_meta.description: The wood-style, plastic patio bench and storage container from Suncast is an attractive and convenient solution for use in your yard or porch. The hinged lid allows for easy access to your tools and accessories. With a holding capacity of 50 gallons (53.8" X 21" X 34.5"), the internal storage space is optimized to maximize holding capacity. Use it on your deck to stow away patio cushions and grill accessories, or in your backyard to store gardening equipment or yard tools. The waterproof, heavy-duty resin construction is durable and resists fading, while the rain water flows off of the box without pooling to keep your belongings dry and mildew-free. Assembly is a breeze and hassle free.
feature_bullets: PATIO SEAT AND STORAGE CONTAINER: Beautiful patio seat has a 50-gallon capacity for patio, deck, yard, porch, garage, and shed storage!
DURABLE: Water-resistant poly resin construction resists fading and rust to keep your box looking new for years to come.
VERSATILE: Take a seat or open to store pool toys, grill supplies, patio cushions, yard and gardening tools, sports equipment, and more!
FUNCTIONAL DESIGN: Lid flips open on hinges for easy access to your items. Rain water flows off of the box to keep your belongings dry and free from mildew and rust
MEDIUM SIZED: Storage seat measures 54" X 21" X 34.5", the perfect size and fit for any living space
Stay-dry design and long-lasting resin construction
Exterior measures 52 ¾ by 21 by 34 ½ inches (W x D x H)
Interior measures 47 ¾ by 17 ½ by 16 ½ inches (W x D x H)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,184 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
